# main

**Type Property**

The main menu system.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class var main: UIMenuSystem { get }
```

## Discussion

In Mac apps built with Mac Catalyst, the main menu system is the app’s menu bar.

## Getting a menu system

- **context**: The context menu system.
